articles.title: Work of Kim Jong Il Published in Russia
Passage of Amendment to Law on Foreign Exchange in Japan Condemned
articles.content:
Work of Kim Jong Il Published in Russia 
    Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's famous work "Respecting the Forerunners of the Revolution Is a Noble Moral Obligation of Revolutionaries" was published in pamphlet by the Paleya Publishing House of Russia on February 12.
 The work, brought out on December 25, Juche 84 (1995), says that to respect the revolutionary forerunners is the demand of the revolution and the noble moral obligation of revolutionaries. The work clarifies the principled matters arising in establishing the moral traits of respecting the revolutionary predecessors and developing sound moral and obligatory relations between the people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised
Measures for Ending Discrimination against Part-time Workers Urged in S. Korea
Immediate Dissolution of GNP Urged
National Seminar in Nigeria
Title of Honorary Professor Awarded to Kim Jong Il
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Title of Honorary Professor Awarded to Kim Jong Il 
    Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The title of honorary professor of the "Gor King - Erdene" Institute of Teachers was conferred upon leader Kim Jong Il on occasion of the his birthday.
 Written on the certificate are the following words: The title of honorary professor of institute has been awarded to Marshal Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, according to a decision of the Science Council of the Institute of Teachers.    
 A ceremony was held at this Institute on Feb.16 on this occation.

articles.title: Reception given by Libyan Diplomatic Envoy
Gifts to Kim Jong Il
Holding Higher Banner of Juche Idea under Songun Leadership Called�@for
articles.content:
Gifts to Kim Jong Il
    Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received gifts from Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, and a delegation of the Japanese Society for the Study of Kimilsungism on the occasion of his birthday.
 The gifts were separately handed to an official concerned by Kenichi Ogami and Masaharu Ueki, secretary general of the Japanese society who is leading the visiting delegation.

articles.title: Israel Urged to Stop Construction of "Security Barrier"
Programme of Modeling Whole Party and Society on Juche Idea
articles.content:
Israel Urged to Stop Construction of "Security Barrier"
    Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA on Feb. 19 as regards Israel's illegal construction of a "security barrier" in the self-governing area of Palestine:
 Israel's large-scale construction of the "security barrier" in the self-governing area of Palestine presents itself as a serious issue in dispute between Arab countries and Israel, causing concern not only among countries in the region but the rest of the world. It is referred even to the International Court of Justice.    
 The construction of the barrier pushed forward by Israel under the pretext of "combating terrorism" defying international law is an illegal act of intruding into the Palestinian area and seriously violating Palestinians' right to existence. 
 The DPRK supports the initiative of Palestine and other Arab countries to bring this issue for discussion at the International Court of Justice and demands Israel immediately stop the illegal construction of the barrier.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Botswanan Ambassador
National Seminar Held
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Botswanan Ambassador
    Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Kgosi Seepapitso IV, new Botswanan ambassador e. p. to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
 After receiving the credentials, the president conversed with the ambassador.

articles.title: Paek Nam Sun Meets New Botswanan Ambassador
"New Operation Plan 5026" under Fire
articles.content:
Paek Nam Sun Meets New Botswanan Ambassador
    Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun met and conversed with newly-appointed Botswanan Ambassador to the DPRK Kgosi Seepapitso IV who paid a courtesy call on him today.    ]
